job_description:
Senior Node.js Engineer – 3 Months Contract (Remote)

Role Overview

We are seeking a Senior Node.js Developer for a 3-month remote contract to help build and optimize backend systems for our upcoming AI-enabled products. The ideal candidate has strong experience in backend architecture, API development, and scalable microservices using Node.js.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain backend services and RESTful APIs using Node.js.
  • Collaborate with frontend and AI teams to integrate APIs and data pipelines.
  • Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices.
  • Ensure scalability, performance, and security of backend systems.
  • Debug and resolve production issues efficiently.
  • Participate in technical discussions, code reviews, and documentation.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • 5+ years of professional experience in backend development.
  • Strong proficiency in Node.js and JavaScript (ES6+).
  • Experience with Express.js, NestJS, or similar frameworks.
  • Solid understanding of RESTful APIs, microservices, and event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with databases such as PostgreSQL, MongoDB, or MySQL.
  • Familiarity with Docker, Kubernetes, or other containerization tools.
  • Strong understanding of asynchronous programming and API security.
  • Proficient with Git and collaborative development workflows.

Contact Information

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at anchana@thoughtminds.io

job_description:
Accountant

About the Role: We are seeking an experienced Accountant with a strong background in tendering processes and hands-on experience in Tally. The ideal candidate will be responsible for managing day-to-day accounts, ensuring statutory compliance, and supporting financial activities related to SEZ operations and tender documentation.

Designation: Accountant

Key Responsibilities: - Handle day-to-day accounting operations using Tally ERP. - Prepare and maintain financial statements, ledgers, and reconciliations. - Manage tender documentation, bid submissions, and financial aspects of tenders. - Ensure compliance with SEZ accounting regulations and statutory requirements. - Coordinate with internal teams, vendors, and auditors for financial reporting. - Monitor accounts payable/receivable and ensure timely closure of books. - Assist in budgeting, cost analysis, and MIS reporting. - Ensure statutory compliance and timely filing of returns (GST, TDS, Income Tax, etc.).

Requirements: - Bachelor’s degree in Commerce / Finance or related field. - 5–7 years of accounting experience, preferably in an SEZ-based company. - Strong working knowledge of Tally ERP and MS Excel. - Experience handling tender-related accounts and documentation. - Excellent understanding of GST, TDS, and statutory compliances. - Strong attention to detail and analytical skills.

Preferred Skills: - Experience in vendor management and tender portals. - Familiarity with SEZ accounting procedures and audits.

Note: Preference will be given to candidates available for immediate joining.

Job Type: On-site

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com

company: InApp Information Technologies India Pvt Ltd
job_description:
Dotnet Fullstack Developer

Experience Level: 5+ Years in Software Development Employment Type: Full-Time (Immediate Joiner Preferred) Work Location: Trivandrum / Kochi (Preferred) Working Hours: Normal Shift

We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack .NET Developer with strong hands-on expertise in .NET Core, Angular (v12 or higher), SQL Server, and Microsoft Azure. The ideal candidate will demonstrate deep technical proficiency across the entire software development lifecycle—from design and development to testing, deployment, and CI/CD automation using Azure DevOps.

You will be responsible for building scalable, secure, and high-performing web applications, implementing event-driven architectures, and integrating modern authentication and messaging frameworks such as Keycloak, RabbitMQ/Azure Service Bus, and Identity Server. Experience with NoSQL databases (MongoDB), containerization (Docker), and distributed application runtime (Dapr) is highly desirable.

Key Responsibilities: - Design, develop, and maintain scalable full-stack web applications using .NET Core and Angular. - Implement event-driven architecture patterns leveraging RabbitMQ or Azure Service Bus. - Integrate authentication and authorization using Keycloak or Identity Server. - Develop and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices. - Work with both SQL Server and NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB). - Implement CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices using Azure DevOps. - Apply SOLID principles, Repository patterns, and Entity Framework Core best practices. - Containerize applications using Docker and explore Dapr for microservice communication. - Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to ensure high-quality software delivery. - Ensure scalability, performance, and reliability in cloud-based deployments on Azure.

Mandatory Skills: - Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer with expertise in the following: - Angular (12 or higher) - .NET Core Web API (2.0, 3.0, 6.0) - SQL Server (2019 or higher) — advanced queries, stored procedures, and table functions - Microsoft Azure (DevOps, CI/CD, and Pipeline Automation) - Proficiency in Entity Framework Core and application of SOLID and Repository Pattern principles. - Keycloak and event-driven architecture - CI/CD - practitioner

Preferred Skills: - Experience with Dapr and container orchestration (Kubernetes). - Knowledge of serverless architectures in Azure. - Strong analytical, problem-solving, and debugging skills. - RabbitMQ/Azure Service Bus. - Knowledge of NoSQL like MongoDB. - Knowledge of Identity Server. - Docker, Dapr.

Technology Stack: - Backend: .NET Core, C#, Web API, Entity Framework Core - Frontend: Angular (v12 or higher), TypeScript, HTML, CSS - Database: SQL Server, MongoDB (NoSQL) - Cloud: Microsoft Azure (App Services, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus) - Authentication/Authorization: Keycloak, Identity Server - Architecture: Event-Driven, Microservices - DevOps: Azure DevOps, CI/CD pipeline setup and automation - Messaging: RabbitMQ / Azure Service Bus - Containerization: Docker (Dapr knowledge preferred) - Coding Practices: SOLID, Repository Pattern, Clean Code, Unit Testing

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@inapp.com.
summary: Seeking a Full Stack .NET Developer with 5+ years of experience in .NET Core, Angular, SQL Server, and Azure. Responsibilities include designing, developing, and deploying scalable web applications using modern architectures and DevOps practices.

job_description:
UI/UX Designer

Position: UI/UX Designer

We are looking for a talented and detail-oriented UI/UX Designer with strong Figma skills to join our product team. You will play a key role in designing intuitive, user-centric digital experiences for our products. From wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes, you’ll own the end-to-end design process, collaborating closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders.

Responsibilities:

  • Lead the design of user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
  • Create wireframes, user flows, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI designs using Figma.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Product, Engineering, Marketing) to understand user needs and business goals.
  • Conduct user research, usability testing, and gather feedback to inform design decisions.
  • Maintain and evolve our design system to ensure consistency across all products.
  • Translate complex ideas into clean, intuitive, and accessible user experiences.
  • Stay up to date with design trends, tools, and best practices.

Requirements:

  • 2+ years of experience in UI/UX or product design.
  • Strong proficiency in Figma (Auto Layout, Variants, Prototyping, Design Systems).
  • Solid understanding of UX principles, user-centered design, and responsive design.
  • Portfolio showcasing design work across web and/or mobile platforms.
  • Experience working with Agile or cross-functional product teams.
  • Ability to present and communicate design decisions clearly.
  • Familiarity with user research methods and usability testing is a plus.

Bonus:

  • Experience with tools like FigJam, Adobe XD, or motion tools (e.g., Principle, After Effects).
  • Front end development skills will be a bonus (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, React or Vue).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at Designer@kottsoftware.com
summary: Seeking a UI/UX Designer to create intuitive digital experiences using Figma. Responsibilities include wireframing, prototyping, user research, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

job_description:
Software Test Engineers / Software Testers

About KOTT Software:

KOTT Software is a globally recognized, ISO 9001:2015-certified company with a strong legacy in enterprise product development and offshore software services since 1997. With a dedicated international clientele, we specialize in delivering robust, client-focused business solutions across diverse industries.

We partner with global organizations to enable and accelerate their digital transformation journey, leveraging deep domain expertise and enterprise application capabilities.

Join us for the opportunity to work on niche US-based domains and industry verticals, collaborate closely with Fortune 100 clients, and contribute in an agile development environment involving technical reviews, quality assurance, and collaborative delivery.

Job Summary:

At least 1+ years of Software Testing experience in a Web application development environment. The job requires interacting with the software application development team, clients & and involvement in test design, developing test cases, test plans & and execution of Enterprise Solutions.

Job Responsibilities:

  • Software manual Testing and related activities in a web-based application environment.
  • To work closely in an Agile development team environment and meet release plan schedules and patch management.
  • Developing and implementing test plans, test strategy, test cases, and test reports for various testing, like, regression, functional & performance testing.
  • Recording and tracking defects through a Web-based project management tool.
  • Setting up and following procedures for bug/issues/defects.
  • Responsible for testing all software products/projects.
  • May need to work in flexible time to attend US/Europe client meetings.

Technical / Functional Requirements (Must Have):

  • Prior experience in Testing Web-based applications / Enterprise level applications and solutions is a plus.
  • Experience in Manual Testing. Writing Test cases.
  • Sound knowledge of STLC, software testing methodologies and procedures.
  • Identifying Test scenarios, creating test plans, test strategy, test cases, and execution.
  • Sound understanding and developing/executing test cases in an application development environment.
  • Knowledge of Quality Assurance/testing life cycle Process is a plus.
  • Should have at MINIMUM 1+ years’ experience in developing AND executing test cases in a client-driven environment.
  • Experience in using any bug-tracking tool.

Preferred Skills:

  • Sound knowledge of software testing methodologies and procedures.
  • Hands-on skills in Selenium / JMeter / UFT automation tools in a live environment is a plus.
  • Ability to write scripts in Java or VB Script is an advantage.
  • Basic SQL concepts and query writing.
  • Good communication & interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to think ‘OUT OF THE BOX’.

Qualifications:

B.E./B.Tech./M.C.A./BCA/BSc. with Diploma in software testing or quality assurance.

Contact Information:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at manualtest@kottsoftware.com

Experience: 0 - 3 years

job_description:
System Engineer L2/L3

Employment Type: Full-Time

Experience: 2+ Years

About the Role:

We are looking for a skilled and reliable L2/L3 System Engineer to join our team to support and manage the rapidly evolving IT infrastructure terrain. This role involves managing mission-critical infrastructure, ensuring system uptime, and resolving complex technical issues across Linux/Windows servers, Cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure), and Enterprise applications. Your role will involve 24x7 support, along with proactive monitoring, automation, incident handling, and escalation management.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide L2/L3 support for Linux/Windows servers, networking, cloud infrastructure, and enterprise applications.
  • Manage and troubleshoot incidents, outages, and performance bottlenecks across production and staging environments.
  • Implement and maintain system monitoring, alerting, and backup strategies.
  • Perform OS patching, system upgrades, and capacity planning.
  • Automate repetitive tasks using Bash, Python, Ansible, or similar tools.
  • Collaborate with DevOps, SRE, and development teams to implement infrastructure-as-code (IaC) and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Support cloud environments (AWS, GCP, or Azure), including EC2, RDS, S3, IAM, VPC, etc.
  • Maintain system and security compliance as per industry standards
  • Document processes, SOPs, RCA reports, and change logs effectively.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong hands-on experience in Linux server administration (CentOS/Ubuntu/Debian, etc).
  • Basic hands-on experience with AWS or GCP cloud environments and familiarity with key services.
  • Exposure to virtualization and container technologies like Docker or Kubernetes, and a working knowledge of common monitoring tools.
  • Comfortable with shell scripting, with some experience or interest in learning Python, Ansible, or Terraform.
  • Experience working with web servers (such as Nginx or Apache), databases (like MySQL or PostgreSQL), and basic understanding of queues services.
  • Good foundational knowledge of networking concepts including DNS, VPN, and firewall rules.
  • Familiar with CI/CD tools (e.g: Jenkins, GitLab CI) and version control systems like Git.
  • Ability to support all level tasks, troubleshoot technical issues, and escalate when necessary.
  • Strong eagerness to learn, with good problem-solving skills and a collaborative mindset.
  • Certifications like AWS, RHCE, or similar are a plus.
  • Experience working in 24x7 managed service environments is a plus.

Contact:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@urolime.com
summary: Seeking an L2/L3 System Engineer with 2+ years of experience to manage IT infrastructure. Role involves supporting Linux/Windows servers, cloud platforms, and enterprise applications with 24x7 support.

job_description:
Solution Architect - DevOps

We are seeking an experienced Project Manager - DevOps to lead and deliver complex projects within our DevOps ecosystem. The ideal candidate will bring a deep understanding of CI/CD pipelines, Dockerization, Kubernetes, and cloud-native architectures. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth project execution while fostering a DevOps culture that promotes automation, scalability, and operational excellence.

Key Responsibilities

DevOps Expertise: - Develop, build, and maintain continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines. - Lead Dockerized and Kubernetes-based deployments with a focus on microservices architecture. - Implement and manage infrastructure as code (IaC) using tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation. - Architect and maintain highly available and scalable solutions across cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP (including EKS/AKS/GKE).

System Administration and Monitoring: - Manage Linux-based environments and ensure seamless operation. - Set up and maintain logging, monitoring, and tracing systems using ELK Stack, Prometheus/Grafana, or cloud-native monitoring services. - Optimize database solutions using MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, or similar technologies.

Project Management: - Coordinate internal resources and third-party vendors to deliver projects on time and within scope. - Define clear project scopes and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders. - Develop detailed project plans, track progress, and manage changes in scope, schedule, and costs. - Track project performance to analyze the achievement of short and long-term goals.

Collaboration and Communication: - Ensure alignment among technical and business teams for successful delivery. - Communicate project status, risks, and resolutions effectively to stakeholders. - Foster a culture of learning, adaptability, and continuous improvement.

Qualifications and Skills

Required: - 5-7 years of experience in DevOps and Open Source culture with a strong focus on CI/CD. - At least 3 years of hands-on experience with Dockerization and Kubernetes. - Proficiency in Linux Administration and microservice-based application deployments. - Expert knowledge of IaC tools like Terraform, Ansible, or CloudFormation. - Advanced experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and their orchestration services (EKS, AKS, GKE). - Strong knowledge of Git workflows and version control systems. - Familiarity with logging, monitoring, and tracing tools like ELK, Prometheus, and Grafana. - Hands-on experience with scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Go.

Preferred: - Strong understanding of database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, and PostgreSQL. - Quick learner with the ability to adapt to new technologies rapidly. - Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@urolime.com
summary: Seeking an experienced DevOps Solution Architect to lead projects. Must have expertise in CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, and cloud platforms like AWS.

job_description:
AI/ML Engineer

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption.

We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, etc., catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s important to us:

We are seeking experienced AI/ML Engineers who will be responsible for developing and driving new business opportunities internationally. The incumbent will be responsible for discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for a range of use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Own the model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with cross-functional teams including product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 3 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create Functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming with a focus on:
  • Code optimization and profiling
  • Multi-threading and multiprocessing
  • Object-oriented programming and design principles
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
  • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
  • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
  • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models combining text, vision, or audio.
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off!
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on Performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through idea and innovation.
  • Work life Balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@techversantinfotech.com
summary: Seeking an AI/ML Engineer to develop and deploy production-level ML/DL and Generative AI solutions. Requires 3+ years of experience in Python, cloud environments, and MLOps.

job_description:

About Techversant: Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience providing high-quality, end-to-end IT solutions. This client-facing leadership role requires you to conceptualize, design, and deliver robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of emerging AI trends. You will manage the entire AI solution development lifecycle, from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Client Engagement & Consulting
    • Engage directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.
    • Translate business needs into AI/ML opportunities and articulate solution strategies.
    • Present solution architectures, effort estimates, timelines, and potential ROI.
  • Solution Design & Architecture
    • Define end-to-end AI architecture, including data pipelines, model selection, AI engines, integration layers, APIs, and deployment strategies.
    • Select appropriate AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and performance-optimized.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts as needed.
    • Perform hands-on design and coding for pipelines, model training, inferencing, or integrations.
    • Create reusable components and automation scripts.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight
    • Build and mentor a high-performing AI development team.
    • Drive agile development cycles for timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

Must-Have Skills:

  • AI/ML/DL Expertise:
    • Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning.
    • Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs).
    • Hands-on experience with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
  • Architecture & System Design:
    • Strong ability to design large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture.
    • Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
  • Cloud & Platforms:
    • Proficiency in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio).
    • Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
  • Data Engineering:
    • Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, and data versioning.
    • Experience with tools like Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
  • Product & Project Ownership:

We are seeking an experienced Solution Architect with strong JavaScript expertise to design, develop, and oversee the implementation of scalable, high-performing web and cloud solutions.   • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of both front-end and back-end web applications using Angular or React, and Node.js.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both on the client-side and server-side, to provide a seamless user experience.

  • In-depth experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, including services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, and more.

  • Extensive experience with front-end frameworks like Angular or React, including component-driven architecture, state management (e.g., NgRx, Redux), and UI performance optimization.
  • Experience with databases, both SQL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB), including database design, query optimization, and migrations.
  • Expertise in version control systems, particularly Git, with an understanding of Git workflows and branching strategies.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.
  • TypeScript experience and fluency.
  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies, and leading cross-functional teams.

job_description:

About the Job

As a specialist in electronics and software for the past 20 years, in-tech is a dynamic, fast-growing engineering company headquartered in Munich, Germany, employing around 2350 employees globally across 20 project locations in 8 countries. in-tech develops innovative engineering solutions for the automotive, rail, aerospace, defence, and industrial sectors.

We are committed to a flexible, modern work culture and work-life balance. Our colour orange stands for liveliness, warmth, and dynamism. We value a strong team spirit, fresh ideas, and a positive work culture. We call it the “Orange Spirit”!

Since 2024, in-tech became a subsidiary of Infosys Ltd. This strategic partnership enables us to offer our customers even more comprehensive development and digitalization services and a greater offshore capability. We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team based out of our Kochi location with hybrid work options. If you’re passionate about joining a growing and dynamic team with a company with a positive culture and team spirit, we’d love to connect with you!

Responsibilities

  1. Responsibility and operation of the DevSecOps infrastructure.

  6. Development and implementation of CI/CD solutions.
  7. Supporting the development and project teams with CI/CD processes and specific tooling.
  8. Setting up and managing databases.
  9. Setup and administration of virtual machines in project networks.
  10. Linking project networks to customer networks, including communication and coordination with customer IT.
  11. Migration and optimization of tools and solutions, including security checks.

Requirements

  1. Minimum 4+ years of experience.

Apply with us

If you have experience and team spirit and are looking for a great place to work, then start your job with us.

As part of our dedication to the diversity of our workforce, in-tech is committed to equal employment opportunity without regard for age, race, colour, national origin, ethnicity, gender, protected veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or religion.

job_description:
Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager

About Fingent

At Fingent, we believe that technology can make a meaningful difference to the lives around us. We create and provide software that is beautiful, usable, and compelling to solve complex business challenges. We nurture smart people who bring out the best in themselves, their peers, and their clients. We are looking for an experienced Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager to join our Project Management Office (PMO) and help us continue our mission.

Key Responsibilities

As a Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager, you will be a key player in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions. You will be responsible for the full project lifecycle, ensuring successful delivery from conceptualization to completion. Your day-to-day responsibilities will include:

  • Acting as a trusted advisor to clients, quickly understanding their business processes, workflows, roles, and needs, and translating them into comprehensive business analysis documents that identify appropriate software features and functionality.
  • Conceptualizing and presenting solutions to clients, creating detailed user scenarios, workflows, and wireframes to illustrate your vision. Secure buy-in.
  • Evaluating and recommending off-the-shelf or open-source solutions that can address customer challenges or technical requirements, either wholly or partially, to optimize project delivery and cost-effectiveness.
  • Collaborating with our design experts to create mockups that effectively communicate solution recommendations.
  • Guiding technical decisions in close collaboration with Development, DevOps, and QA managers, ensuring scalability, security, and maintainability of applications. Engaging with architects and developers to resolve issues and mitigate risks early.
  • Mentoring and developing senior business analysts, fostering their growth in requirements gathering, stakeholder management, and solution design.
  • Serving as a central point of communication, ensuring transparency and alignment between internal teams and external stakeholders throughout the project.
  • Building strong relationships with business stakeholders, product owners, and cross-functional teams to align on objectives, priorities, and expectations.
  • Proactively monitoring project progress, identifying potential risks and issues, and reporting them promptly.
  • Managing and documenting changes to the project scope, and communicating their impact to clients and relevant stakeholders.
  • Ensuring projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the agreed-upon scope.
  • Handling multiple projects and priorities simultaneously in a fast-paced environment while consistently delivering high-quality results.

Qualifications & Experience

To excel in this role, you should possess a blend of technical knowledge, strong communication skills, and a strategic mindset.

  • Education: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
  • Experience: 12+ years of IT experience with at least 5 years in project management or similar leadership roles.
  • Technical Acumen: Able to discuss architectures, APIs, data models, and cloud/SaaS patterns.
  • Team Leadership: Proven track record of managing distributed development teams across different time zones.
  • Communication & Negotiation: Exceptional communication, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills.
  • Domain Experience (Preferred): Experience in one or more of the following domains is an added advantage: Logistics, Aviation, Supply Chain Management, or Insurance.

Required Skills

  • Project Management Expertise: A solid understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and various project management methodologies.
  • Business Analysis Acumen: Mandatory experience in software requirements analysis with the ability to create detailed, well-documented requirements and quickly grasp customer business processes.
  • Solution Architecture: Ability to evaluate and recommend commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) or open-source solutions alongside custom development options.
  • Critical Thinking: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically to navigate complex challenges and make informed decisions.
  • Interpersonal Skills: The ability to build strong relationships with clients and team members, fostering a collaborative and productive project environment.
  • Mentorship: Experience in coaching and developing business analysts and junior team members.

More Information

  • Experience: 10 - 15 Years

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@fingent.com
summary: Seeking a Senior Techno-Functional Project Manager with 12+ years of IT experience to lead project lifecycles. Must excel in business analysis, solution architecture, and client relations.

About Techversant: Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 17 years of experience providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, IOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence, catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s important to us: We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer – Java to design, develop, and maintain high-quality Java-based software solutions. The ideal candidate will have solid experience in Java programming, strong analytical and problem-solving skills, and a passion for building scalable, reliable, and efficient applications.

Job Description:

  • Experience in the design, development, and deployment of scalable web applications using Java 8+ and Spring Boot.
  • Develop and maintain RESTful APIs and backend components for microservice-based systems.
  • Write clean, efficient, and optimized code following best coding practices and organizational standards.
  • Development and optimization in PostgreSQL or MySQL (tables, queries, joins, stored procedures, indexes).
  • Analyze complex business requirements and translate them into effective technical solutions.
  • Support system integration and address compatibility issues across multiple platforms.
  • Work with Kafka or other message brokers for asynchronous processing (exposure level).
  • Work closely with senior developers and technical leads to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
  • Conduct peer code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
  • Collaborate with leads, QA, and DevOps teams for seamless software delivery.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and optimize application performance in different environments.
  • Maintain adherence to information security policies and secure coding guidelines.
  • Communicate effectively with stakeholders and team members, providing updates and escalating issues when required.
  • Use version control tools (Git) effectively for branching, merging, and maintaining clean repositories.
  • Manage and deploy applications on application servers such as Tomcat, JBoss, or WebSphere.

  • Core Java: Strong programming skills in Java 8+ (Collections, Streams, Exception Handling, Multithreading).
  • Spring Boot: Hands-on experience in Spring Boot and Spring MVC.
  • Microservices (Basic Knowledge): Understanding of service-oriented architecture and inter-service communication concepts.
  • Messaging Systems: Exposure to Kafka or similar message brokers for asynchronous communication.

job_description:
AI Engineer (Gen AI)

Company: ShellSquare Softwares (P) Ltd Location: Technopark Trivandrum Experience: 6+ Years Job Published: 30, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 28, Nov 2025

Contact Email: careers@shellsquare.com Website: http://www.shellsquare.com

Brief Description

ShellSquare Softwares is seeking a Generative AI Expert with strong knowledge in Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and machine learning/deep learning (ML/DL). The role involves building intelligent systems that combine large language models (LLMs) with document retrieval to generate accurate, context-aware responses. This includes developing and improving ML/DL models, fine-tuning LLMs, and integrating retrieval systems using vector databases. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to create real-world AI solutions utilizing both unstructured and structured data.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and optimize RAG pipelines for document-level and multi-turn QA systems.
  • Fine-tune or prompt-tune foundation models (LLMs) for domain-specific tasks.
  • Develop and deploy ML/DL models for NLP/NLU tasks such as summarization, classification, and retrieval scoring.
  • Integrate vector databases, semantic search tools, and embedding models for high-performance document retrieval.
  • Work with unstructured and semi-structured data sources (PDFs, HTML, JSON, SQL, etc.).
  • Collaborate with data engineers, ML engineers, and product teams to build end-to-end generative AI solutions.
  • Monitor performance, latency, and relevance metrics; iterate on retrieval and generation models.
  • Implement prompt engineering strategies and hybrid approaches (rule-based + neural) to enhance model reliability.
  • Contribute to research and innovation in applied generative AI, and stay up-to-date with the latest in LLM, RAG, and MLOps ecosystems.

Preferred Skills:

  • Strong experience with RAG architectures and hybrid retrieval systems.
  • Solid hands-on knowledge of LLMs (e.g., GPT, Mistral, LLaMA, Claude, DeepSeek, etc.) and embedding models (e.g., SBERT, OpenAI, HuggingFace models).
  • Proficiency in machine learning / deep learning using PyTorch, TensorFlow, Hugging Face Transformers, etc.
  • Experience with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Weaviate, Pinecone, Qdrant).
  • Experience in text chunking, retrieval scoring, prompt tuning, or LoRA/PEFT methods.
  • Strong background in NLP, information retrieval, and knowledge graphs is a plus.
  • Comfortable with Python and associated data science stacks (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn).
  • Experience working with real-world messy data (PDF parsing, OCR, HTML scraping, etc.).
summary: Seeking a Generative AI Expert with 6+ years of experience in RAG and ML/DL. Build intelligent systems using LLMs and document retrieval, integrating vector databases and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

The successful candidate will assist in requirement gathering, documentation, and stakeholder communication, while also supporting customer success activities. This role offers hands-on exposure to real-world projects, enabling the development of a strong foundation in business analysis and enterprise software implementation.

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Marketing Coordinator to support our global marketing and lead-generation initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess strong experience with HubSpot CRM (including automation and AI features) and excel at coordinating between our UK and India teams. This role focuses on managing daily marketing operations, orchestrating content and campaigns, leveraging automation for efficiency, and tracking performance via CRM and analytics tools.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Marketing Coordination - Support the execution of marketing plans and campaigns in collaboration with the global marketing team. - Manage and update marketing collateral, including case studies, one-pagers, capability decks, and product sheets. - Coordinate social media posts, email campaigns, and digital content with internal teams. - Maintain and update marketing data, lead sources, and reports within HubSpot CRM. - Liaise with content writers, designers, and video creators to meet campaign deadlines. - Assist in tracking campaign results, lead engagement, and marketing analytics.

2. Marketing Plan Ownership & Team Coordination - Maintain and coordinate the marketing activity plan (daily, weekly, and monthly tasks). - Assign and track deliverables across SEO, content creation, digital design, and social media teams. - Support campaign planning, execution, and follow-up to ensure consistent messaging and output. - Monitor content calendars, posting schedules, and marketing priorities across different regions. - Provide weekly updates on progress, blockers, and completed deliverables.

3. Market & Competitor Analysis - Conduct light market research to identify trends, audience shifts, and competitor positioning. - Support benchmarking activities to enhance messaging, branding, or campaign direction. - Feed insights into campaign strategy, product positioning, and content relevance. - Track changes in digital engagement, industry events, or sector-specific opportunities.

4. Performance Tracking & CRM Reporting - Measure and report on key marketing KPIs, including: - Lead generation (Marketing Leads vs Sales Qualified Leads) - Campaign engagement (clicks, impressions, downloads, form fills) - Traffic sources (email, LinkedIn, website, referrals) - Track conversions and attribution using HubSpot CRM. - Share weekly or monthly dashboards with Sales and Leadership teams. - Optimize campaigns based on data insights and performance metrics.

5. AI & Automation - Utilize HubSpot workflows, sequences, and AI tools to automate campaign tasks. - Leverage tools such as ChatGPT, Canva AI, Grammarly, Jasper, etc., for content support. - Enhance efficiency in reporting, document creation, and CRM updates. - Support email automation, segmentation, and follow-up sequences.

Preferred Skills:

Required: - Proficiency with HubSpot CRM (marketing tools, automation, workflows). - Experience with digital content coordination and campaign execution. - Strong organizational and communication skills. - Ability to manage multiple stakeholders and deliverables. - Familiarity with Canva, Google Workspace, and MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, Docs). - Good command of English (both verbal and written). - 2–4 years of experience in marketing coordination, campaign support, or CRM-based marketing.

Bonus / Preferred: - Knowledge of CMS, marketing automation tools, or social publishing tools. - Experience with AI content tools (ChatGPT, Jasper, Canva AI, Grammarly). - Prior experience supporting UK/European teams. - Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Communications, or equivalent.

To Apply: Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Marketing Coordinator”. Please include the following information in the email content: - Current CTC: - Expected CTC: - Notice Period: - Current Location: - Total Relevant Experience: - Willingness to work at the office:
summary: Seeking a Marketing Coordinator to support global marketing and lead generation. Requires HubSpot CRM expertise for campaign execution and performance tracking.

About the Role

We are seeking a proactive and detail-oriented Pre-Sales Business Analyst to play a key role in supporting the sales cycle by translating customer needs into clear, solution-ready requirements and documentation. The role involves close collaboration with the PMO Delivery Director (primary reporting), as well as providing pre-sales support to the Strategic Business Director and Sales & Customer Success Executive through requirement gathering, solution scoping, and preparation of technical inputs for proposals and demos. The ideal candidate will ensure customer expectations are accurately understood, documented, and aligned with product capabilities before transition to delivery teams, and may also support early delivery phases to ensure smooth implementation planning.

Key Responsibilities:

  1. Pre-Sales Discovery & Requirements Gathering

    • Attend client discovery calls and demos alongside the Strategic Business Director or Sales & Customer Success Executive.
    • Capture and document business needs, workflows, and functional expectations.
    • Clarify objectives, use cases, and customer challenges early in the sales cycle.
    • Translate discussions into structured requirement notes or actionable briefs.

  2. Solution Scoping & Technical Documentation

    • Develop preliminary solution outlines, scope summaries, and feature mappings.
    • Create draft Business Requirement Documents (BRDs) or Functional Specifications (FSDs) when required.
    • Produce workflow diagrams, wireframes, or configuration concepts with support from the designer team when needed (e.g., using Figma, Lucidchart, Visio).
    • Align proposed solutions with product capabilities and delivery feasibility in coordination with PMO.

  3. Proposal & Technical Input Support

    • Contribute the technical and functional sections of proposals, SOWs, capability decks, and solution documentation.
    • Provide supporting material such as feature breakdowns, workflow references, screenshots, or demo visuals.
    • Coordinate with PMs, Product Teams, and Solutions Architects to validate effort, timelines, and scope.
    • Ensure documentation libraries, templates, and proposal-related assets remain current and accurate.

  4. Demo Support & Client Workshops

    • Assist in tailoring and preparing demos based on client requirements.
    • Support solution walkthroughs by demonstrating functionality, workflows, or configuration concepts.
    • Capture questions, required modifications, and follow-up actions from demos or workshops.
    • Provide functional clarity to the Sales & Customer Success Executive and Product Delivery teams.

  5. Collaboration with Sales, Marketing & Technical Teams

    • Work with the Sales & Customer Success Executive to align scope, requirements, and customer expectations.
    • Provide technical input to marketing collateral when showcasing system workflows or configurations.
    • Support design and content teams with diagrams, Figma links, functionality clarifications, or feature visuals.
    • Coordinate early solution feasibility with PMO, developers, and product architects.

  6. Delivery Handover & Flexible BA Support (Post-Sale)

    • Prepare structured handover notes for PMO, BA, and delivery teams to begin implementation.
    • Clarify assumptions, workflows, deliverables, and effort during pre-kick-off activities.
    • Where needed, transition temporarily into a Business Analyst role during project initiation.
    • Support configuration workshops, requirement validation, and solution alignment during onboarding.

Preferred Skills, Experience & Background:

  • Experience: 2–4 years in pre-sales, business analysis, solution consulting, or functional coordination in a software/SaaS/IT environment.
  • Experience working with delivery, product, or technical teams to translate requirements into solutions.
  • Familiarity with software implementation lifecycles and client discovery processes.

Tools & Systems:

  • Strong experience with Microsoft Office/365 (Excel, PowerPoint, Word).
  • Working knowledge of Jira or similar project/issue tracking tools.
  • Experience using diagramming or workflow tools (e.g., Visio, Lucidchart, Figma, Miro).

Skills & Capabilities:

  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
  • Ability to gather, structure, and document requirements clearly.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams (Sales, PMO, Delivery).
  • Good attention to detail and ability to handle multiple priorities.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s degree in IT, Business, Engineering, Computer Science, or related field.

Preferred:

  • Industry & Product Knowledge: Exposure to Lean, manufacturing, logistics, or process improvement environments. Understanding of SaaS platforms, workflow-based systems, or ERP/MES/QMS tools.
  • Proposal & Demo Involvement: Experience contributing to proposals, solution decks, or SOWs. Exposure to software demos, configuration showcases, or pre-sales workshops.
  • Collaboration & Market Alignment: Experience working with UK/Europe or international clients. Ability to provide input into marketing or sales collateral (from a functional perspective).
  • Tools & Technology (Nice-to-Haves): Familiarity with HubSpot or CRM platforms (viewing/updating deal notes, not ownership). Experience using Figma or similar design reference tools (for workflows/UI mapping). Awareness of AI tools (ChatGPT, Copilot, Jasper, etc.) for documentation support.
  • Methodologies & Delivery Context: Understanding of SDLC, Agile, or hybrid project methodologies. Ability to work with PMs/BAs during solution handover or onboarding.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resume to careers@ltslean.com with the subject line “Pre-Sales Business Analyst” and include the following information in the email content:

  • Current CTC:
  • Expected CTC:
  • Notice Period:
  • Current Location:
  • Total Relevant Experience:
  • Willingness to work at office:

job_description:
AI Architect - Urgent Opening

Company: Timesworld Media and Technology Solutions (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala, India Website: https://www.timesworld.com Contact Email: hr.tvm@timesworld.com Closing Date: 15, Nov 2025 Job Published: 30, Oct 2025

Brief Description

We are seeking a visionary and highly skilled AI Architect to join our leadership team. This pivotal role will be responsible for defining and implementing the end-to-end architecture for deploying our machine learning models, including advanced Generative AI and LLM solutions, into production. You will lead and mentor a talented cross-functional team of Data Scientists, Backend Developers, and DevOps Engineers, fostering a culture of innovation, technical excellence, and operational efficiency.

Key Responsibilities:

Architectural Leadership: * Design, develop, and own the scalable, secure, and reliable end-to-end architecture for deploying and serving ML models, with a strong focus on real-time inference and high availability. * Lead the strategy and implementation of the in-house API wrapper infrastructure for exposing ML models to internal and external customers. * Define architectural patterns, best practices, and governance for MLOps, ensuring robust CI/CD pipelines, model versioning, monitoring, and automated retraining. * Evaluate and select the optimal technology stack (cloud services, open-source frameworks, tools) for our ML serving infrastructure, balancing performance, cost, and maintainability.

Team Leadership & Mentorship: * Lead, mentor, and inspire a diverse team of Data Scientists, Backend Developers, and DevOps Engineers, guiding them through complex architectural decisions and technical challenges. * Foster a collaborative environment that encourages knowledge sharing, continuous learning, and innovation across teams. * Drive technical excellence, code quality, and adherence to engineering best practices within the teams.

Generative AI & LLM Expertise: * Architect and implement solutions for deploying Large Language Models (LLMs), including strategies for efficient inference, prompt engineering, and context management. * Drive the adoption and integration of techniques like Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to enhance LLM capabilities with proprietary and up-to-date information. * Develop strategies for fine-tuning LLMs for specific downstream tasks and domain adaptation, ensuring efficient data pipelines and experimentation frameworks. * Stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI, particularly in Generative AI, foundation models, and emerging MLOps tools, and evaluate their applicability to our business needs.

Collaboration & Cross-Functional Impact: * Collaborate closely with Data Scientists to understand model requirements, optimize models for production, and integrate them seamlessly into the serving infrastructure. * Partner with Backend Developers to build robust, secure, and performant APIs that consume and serve ML predictions. * Work hand-in-hand with DevOps Engineers to automate deployment, monitoring, scaling, and operational excellence of the AI infrastructure. * Communicate complex technical concepts and architectural decisions effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Requirements (Qualifications/Experience/Competencies):

Education: * Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, Data Science, or a related quantitative field.

Experience: * 10+ years of progressive experience in software engineering, with at least 5+ years in an Architect or Lead role. * Proven experience leading and mentoring cross-functional engineering teams (Data Scientists, Backend Developers, DevOps). * Demonstrated experience in designing, building, and deploying scalable, production-grade ML model serving infrastructure from the ground up.

Technical Skills: * Deep expertise in MLOps principles and practices, including model versioning, serving, monitoring, and CI/CD for ML. * Strong proficiency in Python and experience with relevant web frameworks (e.g., FastAPI, Flask) for API development. * Expertise in containerization technologies (Docker) and container orchestration (Kubernetes) for large-scale deployments. * Hands-on experience with at least one major cloud platform (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) and their AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML). * Demonstrable experience with Large Language Models (LLMs), including deployment patterns, prompt engineering, and fine-tuning methodologies. * Practical experience implementing and optimizing Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. * Familiarity with distributed systems, microservices architecture, and API design best practices. * Experience with monitoring and observability tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack, Datadog). * Knowledge of infrastructure as code (IaC) tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).

Leadership & Soft Skills: * Exceptional leadership, mentorship, and team-building abilities. * Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a track record of driving complex technical initiatives to completion. * Excellent communication (verbal and written) and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to diverse audiences. * Strategic thinker with the ability to align technical solutions with business objectives. * Proactive, self-driven, and continuously learning mindset.

Bonus Points: * Experience with specific ML serving frameworks like BentoML, KServe/KFServing, TensorFlow Serving, TorchServe, or NVIDIA Triton Inference Server. * Contributions to open-source MLOps or AI projects. * Experience with data governance, data security, and compliance in an AI context.

Application Instructions: All applications are to be sent by clicking the following link on our website: https://www.timesworld.com/careers/ai-architect
summary: Seeking an AI Architect to define and implement ML model deployment architecture, including Generative AI and LLM solutions. Lead cross-functional teams in a leadership role.

job_description:
Associate Technical Architect - JavaScript

Company: Techversant Infotech (P) Ltd Location: Module No:2306, Third Floor, Yamuna, Tower II, Technopark Phase III, SEZ Campus, Trivandrum, Kerala, 695581 Website: http://www.techversantinfotech.com Contact Email: careers@techversantinfotech.com Job Published: 29, Oct 2025 Closing Date: 04, Nov 2025

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solution’s company providing high-quality end-to-end IT Solutions and Services to its clients across the globe for more than 17 years. Techversant has been providing Technology services in the key areas of Digital Transformation, Understanding the Evolving Industrial Scenarios, Investment Priorities and Technology Disruption.

We offer expertise and consultation in multiple technology domains like – ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial intelligence, Blockchain, IOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React Vue, etc., catering to various industry verticals globally.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking an experienced Solution Architect with strong JavaScript expertise to design, develop, and oversee the implementation of scalable, high-performing web and cloud solutions. The ideal candidate will combine deep technical knowledge with strategic vision to ensure our systems meet both functional and non-functional requirements.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Architect Solutions: Design and implement scalable, maintainable, and secure application architectures, ensuring alignment with best practices and industry standards.
  • Full-Stack Development: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of both front-end and back-end web applications using Angular or React, and Node.js.
  • Cloud Integration: Build, deploy, and manage applications on AWS or Azure, utilizing services like Lambda, EC2, S3, RDS, API Gateway, etc., to ensure scalability and high availability.
  • API Development: Develop and integrate RESTful APIs and GraphQL services to support front-end applications and other backend services.
  • Mentorship and Leadership: Mentor junior and mid-level developers, providing technical guidance and leadership to ensure high-quality code and development best practices.
  • Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with UX/UI designers, product managers, and QA teams to deliver outstanding user experiences and ensure project deadlines are met.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and optimize application performance, both on the client-side and server-side, to provide a seamless user experience.
  • Continuous Improvement: Contribute to the evolution of development processes, methodologies, and tooling, driving the adoption of new technologies and practices.
  • Code Reviews & Best Practices: Lead code reviews, enforce coding standards, and maintain high levels of test coverage (unit, integration, E2E).

Preferred Skills:

  • At least 3+ years of experience as an architect to design large scale applications.
  • 8+ years of experience in full-stack development with strong proficiency in Angular or React, Node.js, and JavaScript/TypeScript.
  • Strong knowledge of design patterns (e.g., MVC, Observer, Module), software architecture principles, and UML modelling.
  • In-depth experience with cloud platforms such as AWS or Azure, including services like EC2, Lambda, S3, RDS, and more.
  • Strong experience in backend development with Node.js, including building and integrating REST APIs, middleware, and microservices.
  • Extensive experience with front-end frameworks like Angular or React, including component-driven architecture, state management (e.g., NgRx, Redux), and UI performance optimization.
  • Experience with databases, both SQL (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB, DynamoDB), including database design, query optimization, and migrations.
  • Expertise in version control systems, particularly Git, with an understanding of Git workflows and branching strategies.
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and Terraform for containerization and infrastructure management.
  • Strong understanding of software design patterns, microservices architecture, and agile development methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban).
  • Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code with a focus on test-driven development (TDD) and continuous integration.
  • Experience with front-end optimization techniques, including bundling, lazy loading, code splitting, and caching.
  • TypeScript experience and fluency.
  • Familiarity with serverless architectures (AWS Lambda, Azure Functions).
  • Experience with message brokers (e.g., RabbitMQ, Kafka) for event-driven architectures.
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies, and leading cross-functional teams.

Preferred Skills (Additional):

  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and infrastructure-as-code tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
  • Familiarity with GraphQL and building modern, flexible APIs.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule, meaning, you’ll have your weekends off!
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on Performance.
  • Opportunities for various other Bonus programs – for training hours taken, certifications, special value to business through idea and innovation.
  • Work life Balance – flexible work timings, early out Fridays, various social and cultural activities etc.
  • Company Sponsored International Tours.
summary: Seeking an experienced Solution Architect with strong JavaScript expertise to design and develop scalable web and cloud solutions. Role involves full-stack development, cloud integration, and team mentorship.

Way.com is America’s dominant automotive super app, serving over 10 million customers with services ranging from auto insurance and parking to EV charging. Recognized by Bloomberg, ranked 48th on Andreessen Horowitz’s Marketplace list of fastest-growing companies, and awarded top Product in Insurance by UnitQ, Way.com is making car ownership easier, more affordable, and more rewarding.

Work Arrangement: On-site Employment Type: Full-time

This senior leadership position will be responsible for overseeing a team of Business Development Managers, driving revenue growth, setting clear performance targets, and fostering a disciplined, high-performance culture.   • Collaborate cross-functionally with marketing, operations, and product teams to ensure the delivery of seamless and customer-centric solutions.

Qualifications & Experience

  • Experience managing and developing high-performing sales teams with multiple Business Development Managers.
  • Exceptional leadership, negotiation, and communication skills.
  • Industry experience in mobility, parking, real estate, or related sectors is preferred.

Key Attributes

  • Professional, adaptable, and driven to deliver measurable business success.

Why you will love working with us?

  • Clear pathways for career growth in a rapidly scaling technology company.

What’s Important to Us:

We are seeking a visionary and hands-on AI Solution Architect who excels at the intersection of technology, business, and innovation. This client-facing leadership role requires conceptualizing, designing, and delivering robust AI-driven applications while staying ahead of emerging AI trends. You will manage the entire AI solution development lifecycle, from client discussions and requirements analysis to architecture design, algorithm selection, solution development, team guidance, and successful delivery.

    • Interact directly with clients and stakeholders to understand complex business problems.

    • Select appropriate AI/ML/DL algorithms, frameworks, and platforms based on problem type and constraints.
    • Ensure architecture is scalable, modular, secure, and optimized for performance.
  • Hands-On Development
    • Develop critical components or proof-of-concepts as needed.

    • Create reusable components and automation scripts for repeatability.
  • Team Leadership & Delivery Oversight

    • Drive agile development cycles, ensuring timely and quality delivery.
    • Collaborate with DevOps, Product Managers, and QA teams throughout the SDLC.

Preferred Skills:

    • AI/ML/DL Expertise: Proven experience with supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning. Deep knowledge of ML algorithms (e.g., XGBoost, SVM, Random Forest) and DL architectures (CNNs, RNNs, Transformers, LLMs). Hands-on experience with Python, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face, etc.
    • Architecture & System Design: Strong grasp of designing large-scale AI/ML pipelines using microservices, APIs, and cloud-native architecture. Experience designing MLOps workflows (CI/CD for ML) using tools like MLflow, Kubeflow, Airflow, DVC.
    • Cloud & Platforms: Proficient in AWS/GCP/Azure AI/ML services (e.g., SageMaker, Vertex AI, Azure ML Studio). Familiarity with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone), model versioning, and deployment strategies (e.g., REST APIs, gRPC, containers, Kubernetes).
    • Data Engineering: Working knowledge of data wrangling, preprocessing, ETL, feature engineering, data versioning. Experience with tools like Spark, Pandas, Snowflake, Kafka, Databricks, Delta Lake.
    • Product & Project Ownership: Ability to estimate efforts, manage scope, and align delivery with client expectations. Experience in productizing AI models and integrating them into full-stack applications.
    • Soft Skills: Excellent communication, stakeholder management, and presentation skills. Ability to simplify complex AI concepts for non-technical stakeholders.
  • Preferred/Nice-to-Have:
    • Experience with Generative AI (LLMs, GPT, BERT, Stable Diffusion, LangChain, RAG, etc.).
    • Knowledge of Prompt Engineering, Fine-Tuning, and RLHF.
    • Experience in NLP, Computer Vision, Time Series, or Recommendation Engines.
    • Understanding of ethical AI, explainable AI, and compliance in AI systems.

Database - MS SQL / Postgre SQL (Mandatory): - Expert knowledge in writing complex SQL queries for MS SQL Server or PostgreSQL. - Ability to troubleshoot complex stored procedures, functions, etc. - Troubleshoot database server performance issues. - Create custom SQL queries for workarounds, bulk data updates, and data purging.

Monitoring – Azure Monitor, Cloud watch, Grafana, Ops genie (Mandatory): - Acknowledge and resolve alerts from various monitoring solutions. - Knowledge of creating or optimizing alerts is a plus. - Analyze logs from Azure Application Insights or similar tools (e.g., Sumologic).

Ticketing tools – ServiceNow / Jira (Mandatory): - Experience in ticket management, including creation, updating, and triaging. - Maintain ticket SLAs.

Cloud – Azure / AWS (Desired): - Hands-on experience maintaining and troubleshooting Azure/AWS services. - Basic administration of Windows/Linux VMs (scaling, starting/stopping, SSH, log troubleshooting, disk space checks). - Basic administration of Azure SQL or Postgres RDS clusters (performance monitoring, troubleshooting). - Maintaining secrets and storage account/S3 management. - Basic IAM administration. - Troubleshoot issues with applications hosted in AKS/ECS clusters. - Service bus queue troubleshooting.

Deployment – Azure Devops / Gitlab (Good to have): - Deploying applications using existing deployment pipelines. - Troubleshoot deployment failures.

Scripting – Power shell / Shell (Good to have): - Knowledge of writing scripts for task automation and setting up workarounds.

Preferred Skills:

Application Support, Azure Cloud, MS SQL, Support, Infrastructure Maintenance, Monitoring Tools, Ticketing Tools, Site Reliability Engineer, Production Support.

Apply Here: https://careers.rm.com/jobs/3288?lang=en-us
summary: Seeking a Senior Application Support Analyst with 4+ years of experience in Trivandrum. Role involves troubleshooting applications, databases, and cloud services, utilizing monitoring and ticketing tools.

About Techversant:

Techversant is a global technology services and solutions company with over 17 years of experience, specializing in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technology disruption. We offer expertise and consultation in various technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, Node JS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, iOS, Android, Flutter, React Native, Angular, React, Vue, and more, catering to diverse industry verticals worldwide.

What’s Important to Us:

We are looking for experienced AI/ML Engineers to drive new international business opportunities. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and generating qualified leads.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop ML and Deep Learning Solutions: Create predictive, classification, and optimization models using supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques.
  • Design and Implement Generative AI Systems: Build and fine-tune Large Language Models (LLMs) and diffusion models for various use cases involving text, code, and multi-modal data.
  • Build Scalable Recommendation Engines: Develop and optimize recommendation systems using collaborative filtering, content-based filtering, hybrid models, or sequential models.
  • Cloud-Native ML Engineering: Deploy and manage machine learning pipelines and APIs in cloud environments (AWS, GCP, Azure), ensuring scalability, observability, and cost efficiency.
  • End-to-End ML Lifecycle Ownership: Manage the entire model lifecycle from feature engineering and experimentation to deployment, CI/CD, monitoring, and iteration.
  • Collaborate Across Functions: Work with product managers, engineers, and data scientists to translate business goals into AI-powered solutions.

Core Requirements:

  • Minimum 4 years of experience in building and deploying production-level ML/DL systems.
  • Develop proofs of concept AI/ML-based solutions and services and demonstrate them to Business stakeholders.
  • Design and deliver ML architecture patterns operable in native and hybrid cloud architectures.
  • Create functional and technical specifications for AI/ML solutions.
  • Implement machine learning algorithms in services and pipelines that can be used on a web scale.
  • Design, develop, and implement Generative AI models using state-of-the-art techniques.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project goals, research requirements, and develop innovative solutions.
  • Strong understanding of transformer architectures and deep learning model design.
  • Hands-on experience in building at least one production-grade Deep learning solution or Generative AI solution.
  • Expertise in Python programming with a focus on: Code optimization and profiling, Multi-threading and multiprocessing, Object-oriented programming and design principles.
  • Experience deploying models in a cloud-native environment with strong MLOps practices.
  • Understanding of model evaluation, observability, A/B testing, and feedback loops.
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.
  • Strong communication and presentation skills.

Technical Stack:

  • Languages: Excellent understanding of object-oriented concepts and Python.
  • ML/DL Frameworks:
    • Machine Learning: Scikit-learn, XGBoost, LightGBM
    • Deep Learning: PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras
    • GenAI: Hugging Face Transformers, LangChain, OpenAI APIs, Gemini, Agentic Framework
  • Cloud & MLOps: AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, Azure ML, MLflow, Kubeflow, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Data & Compute: Apache Spark, BigQuery, RabbitMQ, S3, EC2
  • Embedding Stores & Vector Search: FAISS, Pinecone, ChromaDB
  • Orchestration & APIs: Apache Airflow, Docker Deployment, and FastAPI are a must.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Experience with multi-modal models combining text, vision, or audio.
  • Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), embedding stores, and agent-based orchestration (LangGraph, ReAct).
  • Open-source contributions in AI/ML or GenAI ecosystems.
  • Certifications in cloud-based machine learning platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure).

Education:

  • B.Tech / M.Tech / Ph.D. in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
  • Equivalent practical experience in developing scalable AI solutions will also be considered.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • Fun family environment surrounded by experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee rewards programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for various bonus programs (training hours, certifications, ideas, innovation).
  • Work-life balance (flexible work timings, early out Fridays, social and cultural activities).
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
