About Techversant:

Techversant is a Global Technology Services and Solutions Company with over 16 years of experience, providing high-quality end-to-end IT solutions and services to clients worldwide. We specialize in Digital Transformation, understanding evolving industrial scenarios, investment priorities, and technological disruptions. Our expertise spans multiple technology domains including ColdFusion, Python, Java, .NET, NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, Golang, PHP, Angular, ReactJS, VueJS, IOS, Android, Flutter, ReactNative, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Blockchain, and Business Intelligence.

What’s important to us:

We are seeking experienced Data Scientist Engineers to develop and drive new business opportunities internationally. The role involves discovering sales opportunities and creating qualified leads.

Job Description:

  • Perform data mining and extract usable data from valuable sources.
  • Utilize machine learning tools to select features, create, and optimize classifiers.
  • Conduct preprocessing of structured and unstructured data.
  • Enhance data collection procedures to gather all relevant information for developing analytic systems.
  • Process, cleanse, and validate the integrity of data for analysis.
  • Analyze large amounts of information to identify patterns and solutions.
  • Develop prediction systems and machine learning algorithms.
  • Present findings clearly to stakeholders.
  • Propose solutions and strategies to address business challenges.
  • Collaborate effectively with Business and IT teams.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience: 4+ years of experience as a Data Scientist.
  • Programming: Knowledge of statistical programming languages like R, Python, and database query languages like SQL, Hive, Pig is desirable. Familiarity with Scala, Java, or C++ is an added advantage.
  • Statistics: Good applied statistical skills, including knowledge of statistical tests, distributions, regression, and maximum likelihood estimators. Proficiency in statistics is essential.
  • Machine Learning: Good knowledge of machine learning methods such as k-Nearest Neighbors, Naive Bayes, SVM, and Decision Forests.
  • Math Skills: Strong understanding of Multivariable Calculus and Linear Algebra, which are fundamental for predictive performance and algorithm optimization.
  • Data Wrangling: Proficiency in handling imperfections in data.
  • Data Visualization: Experience with tools like matplotlib, ggplot, d3.js., and Tableau.
  • Communication: Excellent ability to describe findings to both technical and non-technical audiences.
  • Software Engineering: Strong background in software engineering.
  • Data Science Tools: Hands-on experience with various data science tools.
  • Problem-Solving: Aptitude for problem-solving.
  • Business Acumen: Analytical mind with strong business sense.
  • Education: Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a relevant field is preferred.
  • Proven Experience: Demonstrable experience as a Data Analyst or Data Scientist.

What Company Offers:

  • Excellent career growth opportunities and exposure to multiple technologies.
  • Fixed weekday day schedule with weekends off.
  • Family Medical Insurance.
  • Unique leave benefits and encashment options based on performance.
  • Long-term growth opportunities.
  • A fun, family-friendly environment with experienced developers.
  • Various internal employee reward programs based on performance.
  • Opportunities for bonus programs (training hours, certifications, innovative ideas).
  • Work-life balance with flexible work timings, early out Fridays, and social/cultural activities.
  • Company-sponsored international tours.
summary: Seeking an experienced Senior Data Scientist to drive international business opportunities. Responsibilities include data analysis, machine learning, and proposing business solutions.

Company Overview

Naga Info Solutions Pvt Ltd, established in 2009, is a fast-growing AI and software company serving global clients across multiple industries. As we expand, we are looking for a dedicated and detail-oriented HR & Accounts Executive to support both human resource operations and day-to-day accounting activities.

Role Overview

The HR & Accounts Executive will play a dual role in managing core HR responsibilities such as recruitment and employee engagement, while also supporting accounting functions like invoicing, expense tracking, and payroll coordination. This position is ideal for someone who enjoys working across teams, has strong organizational skills, and can handle sensitive data with care and accuracy.

Human Resources Responsibilities

  • Manage job postings, schedule interviews, and support recruitment
  • Handle employee onboarding and exit formalities
  • Maintain employee records, contracts, and internal HR documents
  • Monitor leave, attendance, and prepare monthly payroll inputs
  • Support employee engagement and performance tracking processes
  • Ensure HR policies and compliance are followed

Accounts Responsibilities

  • Maintain day-to-day records of expenses, reimbursements, and bills
  • Prepare invoices, follow up on payments, and coordinate with vendors
  • Process payroll and handle statutory deductions (TDS, PF, ESI, etc.)
  • Assist with bank reconciliations, purchase records, and financial reporting
  • Work with external accountants/consultants for filings and audit documentation
  • Use tools like Tally, Excel, and Google Workspace for record-keeping

Requirements

  • Bachelor’s degree in Commerce, HR, Business Administration, or related field
  • 1–3 years of relevant experience in HR and/or accounting roles
  • Proficient in Excel, accounting software (Tally, Zoho), and Google Docs/Sheets
  • Basic knowledge of labor laws, payroll, and compliance processes
  • Excellent communication and documentation skills
  • Strong sense of responsibility, confidentiality, and attention to detail

What We Offer

Introduction

The candidate should possess a strong background in Snowflake, demonstrating leadership in technical design, architecture, and implementation of complex data solutions.

  • Familiarity with real-time streaming technologies and Change Data Capture (CDC) mechanisms.

job_description:
Solution Architect (Optimizely)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India, 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com Job Published: 29-Oct-2025 Closing Date: 07-Nov-2025

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a highly experienced Solution Architect with over 12 years of experience to lead a significant migration project. This role is pivotal in transitioning from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud, requiring technical leadership and architectural ownership.

Job Description

We are looking for an experienced Solution Architect to lead the design and implementation of a large-scale migration from SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. This role will serve as the technical leader, responsible for defining a scalable, secure, and future-ready architecture. The ideal candidate has deep expertise in enterprise commerce systems, cloud architecture, and system integrations. You will guide development teams, ensure best practices in solution design, and ultimately take full ownership of the architecture and development transition from the vendor.

Responsibilities:

Architecture & Design

  • Define the end-to-end migration architecture from SAP B2B to Optimizely, including CMS, Commerce, and PIM integration.
  • Design scalable, secure, and high-performance frameworks aligned with business goals.
  • Establish data migration strategies for products, pricing, and customer hierarchies.
  • Ensure API integration between SAP, Optimizely, and other enterprise systems.

Technical Leadership

  • Lead and mentor development teams on best practices and coding standards.
  • Collaborate with Optimizely consultants and internal teams to validate feasibility and technical approach.
  • Drive DevOps strategy for CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and cloud deployment.

Project Ownership

  • Act as the technical owner of the migration project, taking over from vendor after initial phases.
  • Ensure alignment with enterprise security and compliance standards.
  • Provide technical guidance during feasibility analysis and pilot module migration.

Collaboration & Communication

  • Work closely with Business Analysts to translate requirements into technical solutions.
  • Communicate architecture decisions to stakeholders and leadership in business-friendly terms.
  • Support QA teams with test strategy for performance, integration, and security.

Preferred Skills

Primary Skills:

Technical Expertise

  • SAP B2B Architecture: Deep understanding of SAP Commerce Cloud, Back Office, and integration patterns.
  • B2B Platform: Hands-on experience with CMS and Commerce Cloud platforms, specifically Optimizely.
  • Optimizely PIM & Spire: Strong knowledge of Optimizely Product Information Management (PIM) and Spire framework for modern commerce experiences.
  • .NET Development: Proficient in .NET Core and ASP.NET, essential for Optimizely development.
  • Cloud Architecture: Strong knowledge of Azure PaaS, commonly used for hosting Optimizely solutions.
  • Azure Active Directory: Experience with identity and access management using Azure AD.
  • API Design & Integration: Skilled in RESTful services, SAP APIs, and Optimizely endpoints.
  • Frontend Development: Strong React expertise with CMS integration experience.

Architectural Leadership

  • Modern Architecture Concepts: Experience with monolithic and microservices-based systems.
  • Solution Architecture Design: Ability to design scalable, secure, and maintainable frameworks.
  • System Integration: Expertise in bridging SAP and Optimizely platforms, including middleware and data flow strategies.
  • Performance & Scalability: Planning for optimized performance and future growth.
  • Security & Compliance: Knowledge of enterprise-grade security, data protection, and regulatory standards.

Project Ownership

  • End-to-End Leadership: Proven ability to lead projects from blueprint to execution.
  • Vendor Transition: Skilled in taking over architecture and development from external consultants.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Capable of translating technical decisions into business value for diverse audiences.

Secondary Skills:

Technical Enhancements

  • GraphQL & Headless CMS Architecture: Beneficial for building modern, flexible commerce experiences.
  • DevOps & CI/CD Pipelines: Experience with tools like Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions for automated deployments.
  • Containerization: Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes for scalable and efficient deployments.

Soft Skills:

  • Team Mentoring & Coaching: Experienced in guiding developers through complex migration phases and technical transitions.
  • Agile Methodology: Skilled in managing sprints, backlogs, and iterative delivery cycles to ensure timely and quality outcomes.
  • Analytical Thinking & Problem-Solving: Strong capability in feasibility analysis, module mapping, and resolving architectural challenges.
  • Continuous Learning Mindset: Proactively stays updated with evolving trends in SAP BTP, Optimizely, and cloud technologies.

Application Instructions

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Fraudulent Job Offers:

Please be aware that some fraudsters may promise jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never requests payment for job applications or placements. We only contact candidates through our official website or LinkedIn. All official employment-related emails originate from our official HR email ID. For any clarification or to report suspicious activity, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking an experienced Solution Architect for a SAP B2B to Optimizely migration. Requires expertise in commerce platforms, cloud architecture, and system integration for technical leadership and project ownership.

The SDET role combines strong programming and QA expertise to design, develop, and execute automated and manual tests. Responsibilities include validating functional workflows, API integrations, and data accuracy, alongside building automation frameworks, integrating tests into CI/CD pipelines, and collaborating with development and business teams to deliver a robust and scalable solution.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain automated test suites using .NET Core/C#, Selenium, or Playwright.
  • Perform API testing for ECC-Optimizely integrations using Postman or RestSharp.
  • Validate migrated data using SQL queries and backend checks.
  • Implement unit and integration tests with xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest.
  • Set up and manage test pipelines in Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Conduct functional, regression, and end-to-end testing for ecommerce workflows.
  • Perform performance testing using JMeter, k6, or similar tools.
  • Ensure secure API practices and basic security testing (OWASP awareness).
  • Collaborate in Agile teams, participate in sprint planning, and report defects in JIRA or Azure Boards.
  • Generate test reports using ExtentReports, Allure, or custom dashboards.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills: * Technical Testing: * .NET Core / C#: Strong programming skills for writing automated tests and test utilities. * API Testing: Experience with tools like Postman, RestSharp, or Swagger for testing ECC-Optimizely integrations. * Unit Testing Frameworks: Proficiency in xUnit, NUnit, or MSTest. * Test Automation: Building and maintaining automation suites using Selenium WebDriver or Playwright (for UI testing). * SQL & Data Validation: Writing queries to validate migrated data between ECC and Optimizely. * CI/CD Integration: Setting up test pipelines in Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins. * Functional & Integration Testing: * End-to-End Test Scenarios: Covering product catalog, pricing, inventory, and order workflows. * Regression Testing: Ensuring stability after each migration phase. * Error Handling & Logging: Implementing robust logging and exception tracking. * Quality Practices: * Test Strategy & Planning: Creating test plans aligned with migration phases. * Defect Management: Using tools like JIRA, Azure Boards, or TestRail. * Version Control: Git for managing test code and collaboration.

Secondary Skills: * Performance & Security Testing: * Load Testing Tools: JMeter, k6, or Locust for performance validation. * Security Testing Basics: Awareness of OWASP Top 10 and secure API practices. * SAP ECC Awareness: * Basic ABAP Understanding: To interpret ECC logic and validate data extraction. * ECC Data Models: Familiarity with tables like MARA, KNA1, VBAK for test data setup. * Optimizely Platform Familiarity: * Optimizely Commerce Workflows: Understanding how catalog and order flows work. * CMS Testing: Validating content rendering and personalization logic. * Collaboration & DevOps: * Test Reporting Tools: Extent Reports, Allure, or custom dashboards. * Agile Methodology: Working in sprints, attending stand-ups, and contributing to retrospectives.

Soft Skills:

  • Strong communication and documentation abilities.
  • Analytical thinking to identify edge cases and potential data issues.
  • Proactive collaboration with developers, business analysts, and stakeholders.

job_description:
Fullstack Developer (Optimizely)

Company: Reflections Info Systems (P) Ltd Location: 9A2, Carnival Technopark, Kariyavattom P.O, Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India , 695581 Website: http://www.reflectionsglobal.com Contact Email: Careers@reflectionsinfos.com

Closing Date: 07, Nov 2025 Job Published: 29, Oct 2025

Introduction

We are looking for candidates with 3+ years of experience for this role.

Job Description

We are seeking a talented Full Stack Developer to contribute to the SAP B2B to Optimizely Commerce Cloud migration project. This role involves building and integrating front-end and back-end components for the Optimizely Commerce platform using React.js and .NET Core. The developer will work on integrations with Spire CMS and PIM systems, ensure smooth data exchange between SAP ECC and Optimizely, and focus on performance optimization, security, and deployment leveraging Azure services.

Responsibilities:

  • Develop responsive UIs using React.js/Next.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
  • Build and maintain backend services using .NET Core (C#) and ASP.NET Web API.
  • Integrate Spire CMS and PIM for B2B ecommerce workflows.
  • Implement secure RESTful APIs for SAP ECC–Optimizely integration.
  • Manage SQL Server databases and use Entity Framework Core for ORM.
  • Set up and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Utilize Azure services (Logic Apps, API Management, Service Bus, Functions, Key Vault) for integration and security.
  • Ensure authentication via OAuth2/OpenID Connect and Azure AD.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment.

Preferred Skills:

B2B: - Experience with CMS platforms (Optimizely preferred): Understanding content modeling, workflows, personalization. - Experience with Commerce Cloud platforms: Familiarity with B2B commerce systems like SAP Commerce Cloud or Salesforce Commerce Cloud.

Frontend: - React.js / Next.js: For building modern, performant UIs. - TypeScript: For scalable and maintainable code. - Tailwind CSS / SASS: For styling. - Spire CMS (Must-Have): Deep understanding of Spire architecture for B2B ecommerce.

Backend: - .NET Core (C#): Essential for Optimizely backend development. - ASP.NET MVC / Web API: For building and exposing services.

Database: - SQL Server: Common in enterprise environments. - Entity Framework Core: ORM for .NET.

Integration & PIM: - PIM Integration Knowledge: Handling product data workflows and integration with Optimizely. - SAP ECC Data Models: Familiarity with MARA, KNA1, VBAK for integration planning.

DevOps & Deployment: - Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions: For CI/CD pipelines. - Docker & Kubernetes: For containerization and orchestration. - Azure Cloud Expertise: Logic Apps, API Management, Service Bus, Functions, Key Vault, DevOps (CI/CD), and Application Insights for SAP-Optimizely integration.

Authentication & Security: - OAuth2 / OpenID Connect. - Azure Active Directory for identity management.

Secondary Skills:

CMS Specific: - Optimizely CMS / Optimizely Commerce – Valuable but not mandatory if the developer has CMS experience. - Optimizely Graph – For headless CMS scenarios.

Frontend Enhancements: - Redux / Zustand – For state management. - Storybook – For UI component documentation.

Backend Enhancements: - GraphQL – For flexible data querying. - Redis – For caching.

Testing: - Jest / React Testing Library - xUnit / NUnit - Postman / Swagger

Monitoring & Analytics: - Application Insights - Google Tag Manager / GA4

Project Management: - Jira / Azure Boards - Confluence / Notion

Soft Skills:

  • Analytical Thinking: Designing scalable systems and solving complex logic problems.
  • Clear Communication: Explaining technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  • Accountability: Taking ownership of data integrity, performance, and security.
  • Collaboration: Coordinating with FE developers, QA, and integration teams.
  • Resilience: Handling production issues and debugging under pressure.

How to Apply:

Interested candidates may forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com along with their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice Regarding Job Applications:

Please be aware that some fraudsters may claim to offer jobs with Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never requests payment for job opportunities. We communicate with candidates exclusively through our official website or LinkedIn. All employment-related emails originate from our official HR email address. For any clarifications or alerts regarding this matter, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking a Full Stack Developer with 3+ years of experience for SAP B2B to Optimizely migration. Responsibilities include front-end and back-end development using React.js and .NET Core.

Introduction

Reflections Info Systems is seeking a Technical Project Manager with over 12 years of experience in migration projects, specifically from SAP Commerce (Hybris) to Optimizely Commerce Cloud. This role demands end-to-end delivery oversight, including team onboarding, vendor knowledge transition, governance, SLA adherence, and quality assurance. The ideal candidate will possess strong B2B domain knowledge, a hands-on technical understanding, and exceptional leadership skills to ensure a successful migration and long-term ownership of the solution.

Responsibilities:

Project Planning & Delivery - Define and manage the migration roadmap, timelines, and milestones. - Oversee end-to-end delivery, ensuring SLA compliance, quality, and governance. - Conduct feasibility analysis and risk assessments for migration phases.

Team & Vendor Management - Lead team onboarding and ensure a smooth transition of knowledge from vendors. - Act as the primary liaison between internal teams, vendors, and stakeholders. - Drive the vendor handover strategy for architecture and development ownership.

Technical Oversight - Ensure alignment with solution architecture and technical standards. - Collaborate with architects and developers to resolve technical challenges. - Monitor integration, data migration, and performance testing activities.

Governance & Reporting - Maintain project documentation, dashboards, and progress reports. - Conduct status meetings and communicate updates to leadership. - Ensure compliance with security, quality, and enterprise standards.

Preferred Skills:

Primary Skills - Experience in migration projects – ideally SAP Hybris to Optimizely. - Strong B2B domain knowledge – pricing, catalogs, workflows, customer hierarchies. - Hands-on technical understanding – .NET Core, APIs, CMS/Commerce Cloud concepts. - Proficiency in Agile project management – sprint planning, backlog management. - Excellent stakeholder communication and vendor management skills. - Strong governance and SLA management experience.

Secondary Skills - Direct experience with Optimizely Commerce Cloud and Spire framework. - Experience with JS framework (React/Angular/VueJS) and CMS proficiency. - Familiarity with SAP Commerce Cloud (Hybris) architecture. - Knowledge of Azure cloud services and CI/CD pipelines. - Exposure to data migration strategies and performance optimization. - Certification in PMP or Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Soft Skills - Leadership & Team Management: Ability to inspire, guide, and manage cross-functional teams. - Communication Skills: Clear and concise communication with technical and non-technical stakeholders. - Problem-Solving & Decision-Making: Ability to resolve issues quickly and make informed decisions. - Negotiation & Influencing: Skilled in managing vendor relationships and stakeholder expectations. - Adaptability: Comfortable with evolving priorities and dynamic project environments. - Conflict Resolution: Ability to handle disagreements and maintain team harmony. - Time Management & Prioritization: Ensures deadlines and deliverables are met efficiently.

Application Instructions:

Interested candidates are requested to forward their detailed resumes to Careers@reflectionsinfos.com, including their notice period, current and expected CTC details.

Important Notice: Be aware of fraudulent activities where individuals claim to offer jobs at Reflections Info Systems for a fee. Reflections Info Systems never asks for payment for job opportunities. Communication is exclusively through our official website or LinkedIn, and all employment-related emails originate from our official HR email address. For any clarifications or alerts regarding this matter, please contact careers@reflectionsinfos.com.
summary: Seeking an experienced Technical Project Manager for SAP Hybris to Optimizely migration. Responsibilities include end-to-end delivery, team management, and technical oversight.

Full Stack .NET Developer - Urgent Requirement

Company: Timesworld Media and Technology Solutions (P) Ltd Location: Trivandrum, Kerala Contact: hr.tvm@timesworld.com | https://www.timesworld.com/careers/full-stack-net-developer Published: October 28, 2025 Closing Date: November 15, 2025

Brief Description

Timesworld Media and Technology Solutions is seeking a highly motivated Full Stack .NET Developer to join our team. The role involves building and maintaining scalable, cloud-native applications using the latest .NET technologies, working across backend services and frontend UI. We leverage microservices architecture, Blazor advancements, Minimal APIs, and modern development practices. The ideal candidate is comfortable working independently and collaboratively, adapts quickly to new tools, possesses strong debugging skills, and has excellent communication.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and develop enterprise-grade applications using .NET 8, C#, and front-end frameworks (Blazor, React, or Angular).
  • Architect and implement RESTful APIs, Minimal APIs, and microservices with a focus on scalability and performance.
  • Utilize source generators for compile-time performance optimizations.
  • Integrate and work with queuing and streaming systems such as Kafka, RabbitMQ.
  • Build and maintain containerized applications with Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Develop solutions with open-source integrations, including Dapr, Redis, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
  • Implement OpenTelemetry for distributed tracing and observability.
  • Handle big data operations and real-time event processing within the .NET ecosystem.
  • Design, develop, and deploy serverless functions using AWS Lambda and other cloud-native services.
  • Design and deploy Azure Functions for microservices/APIs, event processing, data pipelines, scheduled jobs, automation tasks, and webhook integrations.
  • Ensure compliance with data privacy regulations such as GDPR and CCPA, including implementation of location-based data handling policies.
  • Maintain clean, secure, and well-documented code across both backend and frontend components.
  • Work independently to deliver high-quality features in fast-paced, high-pressure environments.

Requirements (Qualifications/Experience/Competencies)

  • 4+ years of experience in .NET Core / .NET 5/6/7/8 development.
  • Proficient in REST APIs, microservices, and Minimal APIs.
  • Strong experience with Blazor and other modern .NET web frameworks.
  • Solid understanding of multilevel/n-tier architecture design.
  • Skilled with SQL Server, PostgreSQL, Entity Framework, Dapper, and NoSQL databases like MongoDB and Redis.
  • Strong experience in Cross-Platform & Hybrid DB Usage, with hands-on experience in cross-platform migrations, schema transformation, and data consistency validation.
  • Hands-on experience with Docker, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation.
  • Good exposure to event-driven architecture and messaging queues.
  • Experience with OpenTelemetry and application monitoring tools.
  • Experience designing serverless architectures, especially with AWS Lambda for scalable microservices and event-driven apps.
  • Knowledge of data privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA) and best practices for location-based data storage.

Preferred Skills

  • Experience with Azure Cloud, including Azure Functions, App Services, and Azure Storage.
  • Familiarity with Dapr, Kafka, etc.
  • Exposure to AI/ML in .NET, especially generative AI integration scenarios.
  • Practical knowledge of source generators and .NET performance tuning.
  • Active involvement with open-source tools and GitHub-based workflows.

Soft Skills

  • Strong problem-solving skills, ability to manage priorities, and work independently with minimal supervision in a fast-paced environment.
  • Quick learner with a passion for emerging technologies, collaborative mindset, and the ability to mentor and support junior developers.

To Apply: Please visit our careers page: https://www.timesworld.com/careers/full-stack-net-developer
summary: Seeking a Full Stack .NET Developer for cloud-native applications using .NET 8, Blazor, and microservices. Must have 4+ years experience, strong API/database skills, and cloud-native development knowledge.

The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in Angular, React, or Vue.js, along with solid knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. A good understanding of responsive web design and SEO best practices is essential. You should be comfortable building user interfaces that work seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes.

  • Optimize web applications for speed, scalability, and SEO best practices.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex frontend issues to enhance functionality and user satisfaction.
  • Stay updated with the latest web development trends and technologies.

Preferred Skills

  • Minimum 4 years of professional experience in frontend development.

  • Knowledge of WebGL or 3D-related frameworks like Three.js.
  • Familiarity with CSS preprocessors (e.g., SASS, LESS) or CSS-in-JS (e.g., styled-components).

At iBoson, you’ll work with emerging AR & AI technologies, contribute to impactful projects, and grow in a collaborative and tech-driven environment. If you're ready to take on exciting challenges, we’d love to hear from you! Send your resume to career@ibosoninnov.com.

Preferred Skills: - Excellent receptive skill in English & Hindi language. - Multilingual skill over Kannada, Telugu, or Tamil languages. - Proven ability to work with large datasets and meet deadlines. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. - Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
